title: Trout country
brief_description: Trout fishing in the rivers and lakes of Tasmania. Shows the breeding grounds and the work of the Inland Fisheries Commission in studying the habits of the trout. Explains the five ways to angle trout - dry fly casting, wet fly fishing, spinning, natural bait from boat or shore, and trawling from a boat. Shows the famous Shannon Rise.
